messages.title: A full-time MP to represent everyone in Wrexham
messages.content: Aled Roberts is backing Rob Walsh for MP because he believes Rob is a hard-working and determined person who would make an exceptional MP for Wrexham.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Campaign for more nurses and increased funding for the NHS in Wales.
Campaign to increase the 'pupil deprivation grant' to help the poorest children in Wales.
Campaign for the protection of much loved green fields throughout Wrexham.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Wrexham has had the same MP for the past 14 years and a new MP is desperately needed.

issues.environment: Campaign for the protection of much loved green fields throughout Wrexham.
issues.health: Campaign for more nurses and increased funding for the NHS in Wales.
issues.socialWelfare: Campaign to increase the 'pupil deprivation grant' to help the poorest children in Wales.

housing.content: Played leading role in halting a proposed housing development on a much loved green field in Llay.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has taught many post-16 students in Wrexham, helping them to progress into life.
An active governor at his former secondary school, kept a strong connection with his roots.
A strong campaigner for Wrexham's Country Parks, speaking out against proposals to charge for car parking.
Played leading role in halting a proposed housing development on a much loved green field in Llay.

endorsements.endorsement: Aled Roberts is backing Rob Walsh to be our next MP because he is a hard-working and determined person who would make an exceptional MP for Wrexham.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Three reasons to vote for Rob: 1. Rob is local to Wrexham having attended both Llay and Darland schools as a youngster. 2. Rob has worked in Wrexham for many years helping lots of people along the way. 3. Wrexham has had the same MP for the past 14 years and a new MP is desperately needed.
